caption.center: LYNNE DAVIS HARRISON v. HENRY V. DAVIS, Trustee u/w of

opinion.posture:
This matter came on to be heard on a show cause order issued by this court on October 25, 1978.
No cause having been shown by the parties, the appeal inPage 924 the above-entitled matter is dismissed.
opinion.attorneys:
Paul G. MacLean, for plaintiff.
Aram K. Berberian, for defendant.
